entry.title: Java разработчик
entry.text:
#вакансия #android #backend #java #kotlin #senior

Вакансия: Kotlin/Java Backend Software Engineer
Формат работы: удаленка / #remote
Занятость: полная / частичная #fulltime #parttime
Зарплатная вилка: от $2500 до $3500 по итогам собеседования
Имя компании: Take it Personally B.V.
Адрес компании: #Amsterdam
Описание работы: https://takeitpersonally.me/kotlin-java-backend-software-engineer/

Backend Software Engineer with experience with Java and Kotlin to join our remote team full-time within European time zone.

RESPONSIBILITIES
 • Drive key technical decisions from the start of the project
 • Write unit tests and integrate into CI/CD
 • Own the Feature, Own the Code – feel responsible for what you create. This starts with bringing in your own feature ideas, goes over development, testing and ends in deploying your code and monitoring the feature
 • Design and develop systems based on product requirements or refactorings

REQUIREMENTS
 • Curiosity about ethical / mindful / humane tech space
 • 3+ years of experience with Java or Kotlin
 • Familiar with the quirks of Spring
 • Keen about principles and practices of scalable web applications, such as RESTful APIs, dealing with transactions and resiliency
 • Deep knowledge of best practices, APIs and libraries needed for building web applications
 • Strong understanding of application architecture and object-oriented design
 • Passion for continuous learning and understanding
 • Ability to operate in fast-paced, deadline driven, collaborative and iterative programming environment
 • Proven tech documentation skills
 • Excellent verbal and written communication in English

WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU
 • No bureaucracy, flat organisational structure
 • Competitive salary and shares package
 • Be part of the team from the start and grow with the company
 • Business trips to Spain and the Netherlands

Contact: @takeitpersonally
Email: olga@mytip.app
Application form: https://takeitpersonally.me/kotlin-java-backend-software-engineer/
